summary: Ragdoll cats are a special breed known for their friendly personalities. They have beautiful blue eyes and soft, long fur. These cats are very relaxed and love to be held, often going limp like a rag doll, which is how they got their name. They are large and heavy, with a unique color pattern. Ragdolls are popular pets in the UK and the US because they get along well with people and other animals. They are often called "dog-like" due to their loyal and friendly behavior.
title: Ragdoll
